name: Apple
description: A sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

name: Banana
description: A long, curved fruit that grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.

name: Carrot
description: A tapering orange-colored root eaten as a vegetable.

name: Broccoli
description: An edible green plant in the cabbage family whose large flowering head is eaten as a vegetable.

name: Chicken Breast
description: A lean cut of meat taken from the pectoral muscle on the underside of the chicken.

name: Salmon
description: A popular food fish known for its pink flesh and rich flavor.

name: Milk
description: A white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals, commonly consumed by humans.

name: Eggs
description: An oval or round object laid by a female bird, reptile, fish, or invertebrate, usually containing a developing embryo.

name: Bread
description: A staple food prepared from a dough of flour and water, usually by baking.

name: Rice
description: A staple food for a large part of the world's human population, especially in Asia.
